articles.description: A number of deaths by people vaccinated has prompted safety reviews in a number of European countries, while AstraZeneca maintains that with 17 million inoculated, the number of problems has been tiny.
articles.title: Covid-19 live updates: AstraZeneca asserts no link between its vaccine and blood clots as more countries suspend use - The Washington Post
